step_data.thought: I've successfully filtered the customer groups by name using 'VIP' as the search term. Looking at the current state of the page, I can see that the filter has been applied as indicated by the 'Active filters:' section which shows 'Group: VIP'. The table now displays 6 records of customer groups that contain 'VIP' in their name. This satisfies the user's goal of filtering customer groups by name.\n\nI've completed the requested task of filtering customer groups by ID or name. In this case, I filtered by name using 'VIP' as the filter term. The results are now displayed in the table.
step_data.action: stop('I have successfully filtered the customer groups by name using "VIP" as the search term. The system found 6 matching customer groups. You can see the results in the table below the filters section. If you want to filter by ID instead, you can click on the Filters button again and use the ID field.')
